Name: tubesync
Overview: TubeSync is a PVR (personal video recorder) for YouTube. Or, like Sonarr but for YouTube (with a built-in download client). It is designed to synchronize channels and playlists from YouTube to local directories and update your media server once media is downloaded.

TubeSync Workers.Name: TubeSync Workers
TubeSync Workers.Description: If you add a significant amount of work due to adding many large channels you may need to increase the number of background workers. Try around ~4 at most, although the absolute maximum allowed is 8. Default is 2.

TubeSync WebUI Username.Name: TubeSync WebUI Username
TubeSync WebUI Username.Description: Sets the username for HTTP basic authentication. Default is none.

TubeSync WebUI Password.Name: TubeSync WebUI Password
TubeSync WebUI Password.Description: Sets the password for HTTP basic authentication. Default is none.

Database.Name: Database
Database.Description: Optional external database connection details. Ex: mysql://user:pass@host:port/database. Default is none.

Hosts.Name: Hosts
Hosts.Description: Django's ALLOWED_HOSTS. Ex: tubesync.example.com,otherhost.com. Default is none.

PUID.Name: PUID
PUID.Description: UID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

PGID.Name: PGID
PGID.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Downloads.Name: Downloads
Downloads.Description: Path to store downloaded content. Default is none.
